entities.name: ron
entities.description: “Er — is it my eyes, or has everything gone green?” said Ron.

entities.name: middle-aged american witches
entities.description: a group of middle-aged American witches sat gossiping happily beneath a spangled banner...

entities.name: the salem witches' institute

relationships.description: Harry caught snatches of conversation in strange languages from the inside of tents they passed,
“Er — is it my eyes, or has everything gone green?” said Ron.
Harry caught snatches of conversation in strange languages from the inside of tents they passed,
all of them wearing long white robes and roasting what looked like a rabbit on a bright purple fire,
